lead_paragraph: Stoke City skipper Ryan Shawcross and influential midfielder Xherdan Shaqiri have returned to full training ahead of Sunday's Premier League trip to Liverpool after missing the last two games through injury.

headline.print_headline: Stoke's Shawcross, Shaqiri Back in Training After Injury
headline.main: Stoke's Shawcross, Shaqiri Back in Training After Injury
